TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PrivacyService extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides an endpoint for managing privacy settings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Privacy.MultiplePermissionsCheckResult>> CheckMultiplePermissionsWithMultipleTargetUsersAsync([in]class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<string> permissionIds, [in]class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<string> targetXboxUserIds) runtime managed

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Microsoft.Xbox.Services.Privacy.PermissionCheckResult> CheckPermissionWithTargetUserAsync([in]string permissionId, [in]string targetXboxUserId) runtime managed

Docs.param: The ID of the permission to check. See Microsoft::Xbox::Services::Privacy::PermissionIdConstants for the latest options.
The target user's xbox Live ID for validation
Docs.summary: Check a single permission with a single target user.
Docs.returns: The permission check result against a single user.
Docs.remarks:
Returns an IAsyncOperation<TResult> object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation.
Calls V1 GET /users/{requestorId}/permission/validate

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<string>> GetAvoidListAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Get the list of Xbox Live Ids the calling user should avoid during multiplayer matchmaking.
Docs.returns: A collection of XboxUserIds that correspond to the calling user's avoid list.
Docs.remarks:
Returns an IAsyncOperation<TResult> object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation.
Calls V1 GET /users/xuid({xuid})/people/avoid

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation`1<class Windows.Foundation.Collections.IVectorView`1<string>> GetMuteListAsync() runtime managed

Docs.summary: Get the list of Xbox Live Ids that the calling user should not hear (mute) during multiplayer matchmaking.
Docs.returns: The collection of Xbox user IDs that represent the mute list for a user.
Docs.remarks:
Returns an IAsyncOperation<TResult> object that represents the state of the asynchronous operation.
Calls V1 GET /users/xuid({xuid})/people/mute
